author: pdodds
msg: Updated the packaging engine configuration to more flexible XBean based engine to allow for different components to express how they wish to combine the packaging engines and injectors.

author: felicity
msg: put in a bunch of rules for general testing, all do well on my corpus

author: radup
msg: For the generated code for an array setter where the element is the head of a substitution group the insertNewXXX() setter in the impl class was being generated incorrectly in that it did not pass in the QNameSet defining the members of the substitution group. This meant if you inserted into an array of such things and there were substituted elements already present they would be ignored in deciding what position to insert. This submission fixes that.

author: mikem
msg: Add specific errors for failure while doing initpage redo recovery attempt.
Remove "loadTran" references, that term isn't really useful to current code.
All cases now apply to redo recovery.

author: wrowe
